txt.en: There are many Dunlending warriors along the perimeter around Brockbridge.\n\nYou should defeat Dunlending warriors in the perimeter around Brockbridge and collect their weapons.
The enemies patrolling or holding the line were thinned out, and you helped re-stock Brockbridge's weapon supply by salvaging their weapons. This should help sway the battle in the defenders' favour.
Weakening the perimeter gives the town a fighting chance to survive the siege, or at least maintain the stale-mate.
Put weapons in the weapon cache
Put weapons into the Brockbridge weapon cache
There are many Dunlending warriors along the perimeter around Brockbridge.\n\nYou should defeat Dunlending warriors in the perimeter around Brockbridge and collect their weapons.
The cache of weapons is near Herefara, on the southern side of Brockbridge.\n\nYou should bring the weapons you collected to the weapons cache in Brockbridge.
Everyone in Brockbridge has prepared for a long siege. Despite any amount of preparation, however, there is always a need for more weapons.
The Enemies' Loss is Our Gain

Everyone in Brockbridge has prepared for a long siege. Despite any amount of preparation, however, there is always a need for more weapons. You should defeat Dunlending warriors in the perimeter around Brockbridge and collect their weapons.
